Package org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel

Class BinaryValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel.BinaryValue
  • public class BinaryValue
extends Object
    Class used to represent Binary Values. This is required in particular when the user wants to use the value in a file. To be able to reflect this this object is used: it contains the binary itself, the base 64 representation and the file that has been used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BinaryValue.Type
      The type of the binary value.
